revised_title: Botanical Observations and Descriptions from the Society of Apothecaries Physick-Garden at Chelsea
tldr: This article provides detailed descriptions and observations of various rare plants found in gardens around London, particularly the Society of Apothecaries Physick-Garden at Chelsea, in 1714. The author, James Petiver, discusses the appearance, growth habits, and medicinal properties of these plants, drawing on the work of other botanists and physicians to provide a comprehensive overview of their uses and characteristics.
